price: (44) Allāh alternates the night and the day. Indeed in that is a lesson for those who have vision.
arabic: يُقَلِّبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yuqallibu al-lahu al-layla wal-nahāra inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan li-ulī al-abṣāri
